mapper.select: SELECT UPLOAD_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, CREATE_DT, MODIFY_DT , USER_NO, EMAIL , ATTACH_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY UPLOAD_NO ${sort}) AS RN , UP.UPLOAD_NO, UP.TITLE, UP.CONTENTS, UP.CREATE_DT, UP.MODIFY_DT , USR.USER_NO, USR.EMAIL , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACH_T ATC WHERE UP.UPLOAD_NO = ATC.UPLOAD_NO) AS ATTACH_COUNT FROM USER_T USR INNER JOIN UPLOAD_T UP ON USR.USER_NO = UP.USER_NO) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT UP.UPLOAD_NO, UP.TITLE, UP.CONTENTS, UP.CREATE_DT, UP.MODIFY_DT , USR.USER_NO, USR.EMAIL FROM USER_T USR INNER JOIN UPLOAD_T UP ON USR.USER_NO = UP.USER_NO WHERE UP.UPLOAD_NO = #{uploadNo}
